resources.string: Ace change is an app built by emekarr to help sharpen his sills. It is an app which delivers up to date values of 20 different currencies in the world. \n The app is built using Kotlin and will only be up on Github.

How to use the app? \nThe first time you use the app your need to turn on your internet connection to get the latest exchange rates update. After that the results will be cached and can be accessed offline. Swipe down to refresh the results.
